events.name: Tampa Bay Lightning at Florida Panthers

highlights.headline: Tampa Bay Lightning vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Tampa Bay Lightning vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Tampa Bay Lightning vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights) 2025/11/15 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Jack Finley scored his first NHL goal early in the third period to break a tie and the Tampa Bay Lightning held on to beat the Florida Panthers 3-1 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jack Finley scores 1st NHL goal to help the Lightning beat the Panthers 3-1

video.headline: Tampa Bay Lightning vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights

highlights.description: Anaheim Ducks vs. Minnesota Wild: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Anaheim Ducks vs. Minnesota Wild: Game Highlights) 2025/11/15 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Minnesota backup Jesper Wallstedt made 28 saves for his second straight shutout and Wild beat the Anaheim Ducks 2-0 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jesper Wallstedt makes 28 saves for 2nd straight shutout, Wild beat Ducks 2-0

highlights.description: Boston Bruins vs. Montreal Canadiens: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Boston Bruins vs. Montreal Canadiens: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Jeremy Swayman stopped 26 shots for his fifth consecutive victory and the Boston Bruins overcame the loss of defenseman Charlie McAvoy to a mouth injury to beat the Montreal Canadiens 3-2 on Saturday night in a heated game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Swayman stops 28 shots to help the Bruins beat the Canadiens 3-2 in a heated game

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Los Angeles Kings vs. Ottawa Senators: Game Highlights) 2025/11/16 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Anton Forsberg made 17 saves in his Ottawa return for his first shutout of the season, Alex Laferriere scored in the first period and the Los Angeles Kings beat the Senators 1-0 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Forsberg makes 17 saves in his Ottawa return, the Kings beat the Senators 1-0

events.name: Buffalo Sabres at Detroit Red Wings

headlines.description: — Mattias Samuelsson scored at 1:05 of overtime as Buffalo rallied from a three-goal deficit to snap a five-game losing streak with a 5-4 win over Detroit on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Samuelsson's OT goal lifts Sabres past Red Wings, 5-4, for first road win of season

headlines.description: — Philipp Grubauer stopped all 19 shots he faced in relief of injured Matt Murray, and the Seattle Kraken got two goals from Jaden Schwartz to help beat the San Jose Sharks 4-1 on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Grubauer stops all 19 shots in relief as the Kraken beat the Sharks 4-1
